       <div id="wrapbox10500957">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10500957">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10500957">
          <div class="bi_search">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Search Google Scholar for Journal Articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_20" id="content10500957">
          <div id="boxatt10500957" class="boxatt">
           <label for="searchText10500957">
            <img alt="Google Scholar Logo" src="http://lgimages.s3.amazonaws.com/google_scholar.jpg" />
           </label>
           <br />
           <input type="text" value="" id="searchText10500957" class="google_search_box" title="Google scholar search" />
           <br />
           <input type="button" onclick="var queryString = document.getElementById('searchText10500957').value;queryString = queryString.replace(/\\+/g, '+');var url = 'http://scholar.google.com/scholar?q=' + queryString;window.open(url,'GScholar');" value="Search" />
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21307689">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21307689">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21307689">
          <div class="bi_video">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Find Background Information on a Topic
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_7" id="content21249436">
          <div id="boxatt21249436" class="boxatt">
           <div class="embedclass">
            <img src="http://corp.credoreference.com/images/logos/Credo-Black-landscape-%20147x50.png" alt="Credo Logo" />
            <form action="javascript:void;" onsubmit="javascript:return credoMultiSearchBasic(document.forms.credoMultiSearchFormBasic);" method="GET" name="credoMultiSearchFormBasic">
             <input type="hidden" name="ubasic" value="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com/search/advanced/?include={0}&amp;headingsOnly=false&amp;sort=relevance" />
             <label for="qbasic">
              Search
             </label>
             <input type="text" id="qbasic" value="" size="15" />
             <input type="image" border="0" name="Submit" value="search" src="http://literati.credoreference.com/images/tools/go_button.png" alt="Submit Button" width="54" height="31" style="top:10px; position:relative;" />
             <br />
             <script type="text/javascript">
              function credoMultiSearchBasic(f){if(f.qbasic.value=='Search for...'||f.qbasic.value==''){alert('Please enter a search.');}else{var qbasic=escape(f.qbasic.value);var ubasic=f.ubasic.value.replace("{0}",qbasic);window.open(ubasic,"_blank");}return false;}
             </script>
            </form>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10499439">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10499439">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10499439">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Scholarly Journal Articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10499439">
          <div id="boxatt10499439" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12758915">
              <a id="link_12758915" href="http://arxiv.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12758915,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Physics', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12758915}); ">
               ArXiv.org
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text articles in the advanced fields of physics, mathematics, non-linear science, computer science, quantitative biology, and statistics.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12759638">
              <a id="link_12759638" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://prola.aps.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12759638,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Physics', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12759638}); ">
               PROLA: Physical Review Online Archive
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full-text articles in Physics, the online archive for Physical Review Letters, Reviews of Modern Physics, and Physical Review A-E, containing all APS journal articles published from 1893 to 4 years ago.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12759650">
              <a id="link_12759650" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.sciencedirect.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12759650,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Physics', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12759650}); ">
               ScienceDirect College Edition Health and Life Sciences, Physical Sciences
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of 1000+ full-text Elsevier journals in the areas of health, life, and physical sciences.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12759662">
              <a id="link_12759662" href="http://www.slac.stanford.edu/spires/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12759662,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Physics', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12759662}); ">
               SPIRES
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The SPIRES-HEP is a database of particle physics literature run by the Stanford Linear Accelerator Center(SLAC) since the late 1960's.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12759690">
              <a id="link_12759690" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12759690,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Physics', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12759690}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text access to scholarly and non-scholarly publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>

          <h2>
           News Articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10500922">

           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12759678">
              <a id="link_12759678" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12759678,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Physics', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12286621}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides full text of thousands of newspapers, magazines, broadcast transcripts, business publications, legal materials, and more.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12759681">
              <a id="link_12759681" href="http://www.sciencedaily.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12759681,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Physics', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12286628}); ">
               Science Daily
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               News articles, videos, and images in the subjects of health, math, and the sciences.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>

         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
